column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " It 's gone ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Oh do n't tell me - !
#Text=" Kuei says : " Hm ... That seems awfully convenient .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , if anything , this proves the conspiracy exists even more .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Long Feng was right .
#Text=This was a waste of time .
#Text=If you 'll excuse me , I 'm going back to the palace .
#Text=" Katara says : " The wall .
#Text=They 'll never be able to cover that up in time .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , yeah .
#Text=If you come with us to the Outer Wall , we can prove to you that the secret war is real .
#Text=" Kuei says : " No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall .
#Text=I do n't have any more time for this nonsense .
#Text=" Sokka says : " If you come with us , this time you can ride on Appa .
#Text=" Toph says : " First time flying ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " It 's both thrilling and terrifying !
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah .
#Text=I hate it , too .
#Text=" Kuei says : " I have to be honest with you : part of me really hopes that what you 're telling me about this war is n't true .
#Text=" Aang says : " I wish it was n't .
#Text=" Blue dragon says : " It 's getting late .
#Text=Are you planning to retire soon , my lord ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm not tired .
#Text=" Blue dragon says : " Relax , Fire Lord Zuko .
#Text=Just let go .
#Text=Give in to it .
#Text=Shut your eyes for a while .
#Text=" Red dragon says : " No , Fire Lord Zuko !
#Text=Do not listen to the blue dragon .
#Text=You should get out of here right now .
#Text=Go !
#Text=Before it 's too late !
#Text=" Blue dragon says : " Sleep now , Fire Lord Zuko .
#Text=" Blue dragon says : " Sleep .
#Text=Just like mother !
#Text=" Ursa says : " Zuko !
#Text=Help me !
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's still there !
#Text=" Kuei says : " What is that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's a drill .
#Text=A giant drill made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls .
#Text=" Kuei says : " I ca n't believe I never knew .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " I can explain this , Your Majesty .
#Text=This is nothing more than ... a construction project .
#Text=" Katara says : " Really ?
#Text=Then perhaps you could explain why there 's a Fire Nation insignia on your " construction project " .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Well it 's imported of course .
#Text=You know you ca n't trust domestic machinery .
#Text=Surely you do n't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " Dai Li !
#Text=Arrest Long Feng !
#Text=I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " You ca n't arrest me !
#Text=You all need me more than you know !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Looks like Long Feng is long gone !
#Text=Ha !
#Text=Ah , yeah , I 've been waiting to use that one .
#Text=" Kuei says : " I want to thank you , young heroes , for opening my eyes .
#Text=All this time , what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools .
#Text=And that makes me the king fool .
#Text=We 're at war .
#Text=With the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's why we came to Ba Sing Se , Your Highness : because we think you can help us end the war .
#Text=" Aang says : " We do n't have much time .
#Text=There 's a comet coming this summer .
#Text=Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength .
#Text=They 'll be unstoppable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But there is hope .
#Text=Before the comet comes , we have a window of opportunity : A solar eclipse is coming .
#Text=The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon , and the firebenders will be helpless .
#Text=" Kuei says : " What are you suggesting , Sokka ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation .
#Text=The Day of Black Sun .
#Text=" Kuei says : " I do n't know .
#Text=That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=We 'd be completely vulnerable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're already vulnerable .
#Text=The Fire Nation wo n't stop until Ba Sing Se falls .
#Text=You can either sit back and wait for that to happen , or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Very well .
#Text=You have my support .
#Text=" General How says : " Your Majesty .
#Text=I apologize for the interruption .
#Text=" Kuei says : " This is General How .
#Text=He 's the leader of the Council of Five , my highest ranking generals .
#Text=" General How says : " We searched Long Feng 's office .
#Text=I think we found something that will interest everybody .
#Text=" General How says : " There are secret files on everyone in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=Including you kids .
#Text=" Aang says : " Secret files ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " " Toph Beifong . "
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's a letter from your mom .
#Text=Your mom 's here in the city .
#Text=And she wants to see you .
#Text=" Toph says : " Long Feng intercepted our letters from home ?
#Text=That 's just sad .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Aang ?
#Text=" General How says : " This scroll was attached to the horn of your bison when the Dai Li captured it .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's from the Eastern Air Temple .
#Text=" Katara says : " Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " I 'm afraid not .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh .
#Text=" General How says : " But there is an intelligence report that might interest you .
#Text=" Katara says : " " A small fleet of Water Tribe ships . "
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=That could be Dad !
#Text=" Katara says : " " Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay .
#Text=Iroh says : " You should know that this is not a natural sickness , but that should n't stop you from enjoying tea . "
#Text=Zuko says : " What 's happening ? "
#Text=Iroh says : " Your critical decision .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You are going through a metamorphosis , my nephew .
#Text=It will not be a pleasant experience , but when you come out of it , you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't believe it .
#Text=There 's a man living at the Eastern Air Temple .
#Text=He says he 's a guru .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What 's a guru ?
#Text=Some kind of poisonous blow fish ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , a spiritual expert .
#Text=He wants to help me take the next step in the Avatar journey .
#Text=He says he can teach me to control the Avatar State .
#Text=" Katara says : " And I ca n't believe we know where our dad is now .
#Text=" Toph says : " I know what you mean .
#Text=My mom 's in the city .
#Text=And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is all such big news !
#Text=Where do we even start ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I hate to say it , but we have to split up .
#Text=" Aang says : " Split up ?
#Text=We just found Appa and got the family back together !
#Text=Now you want us to separate ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You have to meet this guru , Aang .
#Text=If we 're going to invade the Fire Nation , you need to be ready .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , if I 'm going to the Eastern Air Temple , Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Someone has to stay here with the Earth King and help him plan for the invasion .
#Text=I guess that 's me .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , Sokka .
#Text=I know how badly you wan na help Dad .
#Text=You go to Chameleon Bay .
#Text=I 'll stay here with the king .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You are the nicest ... sister ... ever !
#Text=" Katara says : " Easy there , big brother ... Though you 're right .
#Text=I am .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara ?
#Text=I need to tell you something .
#Text=I 've been wanting to say it for a long time .
#Text=" Katara says : " What is it , Aang ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , I - " Sokka says : " All right .
#Text=Who 's ready to get going on our little men - only man trip ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " Aang and Sokka , I wish you a good journey .
#Text=Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks .
#Text=We look forward to your safe return .
#Text=" Soldier says : " Your Majesty .
#Text=There are three female warriors to see you .
#Text=They 're from the island of Kyoshi .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's Suki !
#Text=" Kuei says : " You know these warriors ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh yeah .
#Text=The Kyoshi Warriors are a skilled group of fighters .
#Text=Trustworthy too .
#Text=They 're good friends of ours .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Then we shall welcome them as honored guests .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wait .
#Text=Aang .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm really gon na miss you guys .
#Text=" Katara says : " Me too .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aahh !
#Text=Great .
#Text=That 's enough .
#Text=Okay , we love each other .
#Text=Seriously .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You see , Aang ?
#Text=A little positive thinking works wonders .
#Text=We got the king on our side , we got Long Feng arrested , and when we get back , Suki 's waiting for me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah .
#Text=Girls are waiting for us .
#Text=Thanks , positive attitude .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Everything is gon na work out perfectly .
#Text=From now on and forever .
#Text=" Agent says : " Dinner .
#Text=The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King , but the Dai Li remains loyal to you , Long Feng , sir .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hello ?
#Text=Mom ?
#Text=Anyone home ?
#Text=Hey !
#Text=Who do you think you 're dealing with !?
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " One loud - mouthed little brat who strayed too far from home .
#Text=" Kuei says : " In our hour of need , it is with the highest honor that I welcome our esteemed allies , the Kyoshi Warriors !
#Text=" Azula says : " We are the Earth King 's humble servants .
#Text=" Main Aang Iroh Katara Kuei Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Azula Long Feng Mai Ty Lee Xin Fu Yu says : " Minor Appa How Momo Royal Earthbender Guards " Sokka says : " Hey , I remember her !
#Text=She helped you attack us !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yup .
#Text=Back in the good old days .
#Text="
